children.text: F-150 package is built for those who appreciate clean lines and real capability. With just the right mix of premium features and rugged readiness, this truck is equally at home cruising the streets or chasing trails — wherever your next adventure leads.

excerpt: Balanced for both off-road and daily driving, this package features a 2.5" lift, 20" wheels with 285/60R20 all-terrain tires, and integrated TSport styling accents.

additionalOptions: Custom TSport Leather Package w/ Embossed Seats

title: TSport Sportsman

children.text: Where legacy meets bold performance. The

package is the ultimate expression of 25 years of craftsmanship at Southern Off-Road Specialists. Built with premium components and unstoppable style, every Anthem truck turns heads and takes names — on-road or off.

excerpt: Stand out and be bold in the Anthem package. Focusing on the same things as the Valor package, but bolder, more luxurious, and featuring more flare.

additionalOptions: Custom Leather TSport Interior Package w/ Embossed Seats
TSport Appearance Package with Body Side Moldings & Rear Cab Spoiler (Painted to Match)

headerVehicleImage.alt: A premium, show-ready package with 6″ suspension, mud-terrain tires, matched fender flares, 3D badging, and top-tier components.

title: TSport Anthem

children.text: Built for the blacktop. Inspired by the TSport legacy, the

package is a street-tuned powerhouse with a sleek, low-profile stance. Whether you’re cruising the strip or putting the hammer down, this truck delivers head-turning style and pavement-pounding performance every mile of the way.

excerpt: These trucks pack enough features and can-do attitude to take on whatever adventure comes your way – on or off-road.

headerVehicleImage.alt: A street-tuned, low-profile package with a 2–4″ suspension drop, 20″ alloy wheels, performance tires, TSport graphics, and full ADAS calibration

title: TSport 4x4 Sport

children.text:
brings aggressive styling with everyday drivability — the perfect blend of form and function. Designed for lifted-truck enthusiasts who demand more, this package delivers a factory-fresh build with a custom attitude that’s anything but average.

The Valor package includes the aggressive yet practical styling that lifted-truck enthusiasts look for. This is the ideal aftermarket spec list, straight from the factory.

excerpt: A more aggressive lift package with 6″ suspension, 20″ wheels, 35″ all-terrain tires, TSport graphics, and optional speedometer calibration.

additionalOptions: TSport Custom Leather Package w/ Embossed Seats
TSport Appearance Package witth Body Side Moldings & Rear Cab Spoiler (Painted to Match)

title: TSport Valor

children.text:
SuperDuty package is built for those who appreciate clean lines and real capability. With just the right mix of premium features and rugged readiness, this truck is equally at home cruising the streets or chasing trails — wherever your next adventure leads.

The everyday working man’s truck that is able to perform to any desired needs. This is how Fords should have been produced from the factory.

excerpt: Designed for heavy duty use with a 2.5″ lift, 20×9 wheels, 37″ mud-terrain tires, and TSport badging, while retaining refined style.

interiorFeatures: Custom TSport Leather Package w/ Embossed Seats
